segments.text: Mary , besides the resume , I think we should also write an application letter .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so , but how should we write it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think we should begin the letter with a salutation , and the salutation must be very formal .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it should be so . Then we should write the body and in the body we should mention the place where we saw the job advertisement .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We should say we are very interested in that job , and we hope to get that job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We should write our skills and let the company know we are competent for the job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: For example , I have mastered Business English very well , and I also know a little Spanish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you have recommended yourself very well . I should think about how to recommend myself as well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can say you have had a firm grasp of the professional knowledge , and you can communicate with others proficiently in English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . At the end , we should conclude the letter with greetings .
segments.speaker: S2
